revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: (M. 2) At (?) Sepho. (M. 1) To Hierax, strategus, from Amatokos son of Dikaiogenes. I register for the present 7th year of Tiberius Caesar Augustus the twenty eight sheep, two goats, total 28 sheep, 2 goats, which belong to us, and the accompanying lambs and kids which will graze in the neighborhood of Sepho in the Thmoisepho toparchy and through the whole nome, the shepherd being N.N., son of Deios, registered at (the village of) Nesmimis, and for which I shall also pay the proper tax. --- [ed. pr.]

listBibl.bibl: Worp, K. A. - Nielsen, B. "New Papyri from the New York University Collection: II". ZPE 136 (2001) 127-8 (Nr. 12)
